name: Aboard VR
description:
Aboard is a SciFi VR First Person Shooter experience. Awake from your cryo chamber and begin to be immersed aboard a old rusty starship infested with nasty bug like aliens. Take up arms and prepare for battle as you collect weapons and ammo to make it through on your journey.

This game was made in 5 weeks and is missing a lot of features and has no current ending sadly. This project was created for an AIE cross platforming assessment.

This project was created by

Justice Shultz: https://JusticeShultz.github.io/

Alexi Most: https://github.com/alyoshenka

(Feel free to get in contact with us!)

This project supports

Oculus Rift w/ Touch Controllers

&

HTC Vive w/ HTC VIVE Controller

(Note, it may work with other remotes and headsets, but we have only tested with these two devices to confirm they work)

Please note this game is not complete and was a 5 week rush for a school assignment, not a finished market product!
